solar_panel_1.name: Solar Panel
solar_panel_1.description: Captures solar energy and converts it into electrical energy.

embodiment.description: Monocrystalline silicon panels for higher efficiency.

physics_models.name: Power Generation
physics_models.coding_directives: def calculate_power(efficiency, area, irradiance):\n    return efficiency * area * irradiance
physics_models.python_code: def calculate_power(efficiency, area, irradiance):\n    return efficiency * area * irradiance
physics_models.coder_notes: Irradiance is constant at 300 W/m². Temperature effects are negligible.

solar_panel_1.verification_plan: Test under standard solar irradiance conditions to verify power output.

battery_storage_1.name: Battery Storage
battery_storage_1.description: Stores excess energy for use during low-light conditions.

embodiment.description: Provides reliable and cost-effective energy storage.

physics_models.name: Energy Storage
physics_models.coding_directives: def calculate_energy(capacity, voltage):\n    return capacity * voltage
physics_models.python_code: def calculate_energy(capacity, voltage):\n    return capacity * voltage

battery_storage_1.verification_plan: Test energy storage capacity and discharge rate under various conditions.

power_management_unit_1.name: Power Management Unit
power_management_unit_1.description: Regulates and manages power distribution between solar panels and battery storage.

embodiment.description: Efficiently manages power flow to maximize energy storage.

physics_models.name: Power Regulation
physics_models.coding_directives: def calculate_output_power(input_power, efficiency):\n    return input_power * efficiency
physics_models.python_code: def calculate_output_power(input_power, efficiency):\n    return input_power * efficiency
physics_models.coder_notes: Input power is stable and within operating range.
assumptions: Input power is stable and within operating range.

power_management_unit_1.verification_plan: Test power regulation and efficiency under various load conditions.

filtration_unit_1.name: Filtration Unit
filtration_unit_1.description: Removes contaminants from water to produce potable water.

embodiment.description: Provides high-efficiency removal of bacteria, viruses, and micro-plastics.

filtration_unit_1.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency under various water quality conditions.

water_quality_sensors_1.name: Water Quality Sensors
water_quality_sensors_1.description: Monitors water quality parameters such as TDS, pH, and turbidity.

embodiment.description: Provides real-time water quality data for user feedback.

water_quality_sensors_1.verification_plan: Test sensor accuracy and response time under various conditions.

user_interface_1.name: User Interface
user_interface_1.description: Provides user feedback on water quality and system status.

embodiment.description: Simple and intuitive interface for user interaction.

physics_models.name: Display Response Time
physics_models.coder_notes: Time constant represents display response time.
assumptions: Time constant represents display response time.

user_interface_1.verification_plan: Test display response time and user interface usability.
